title: My Little Passenger
description:
Description :
        Cosplay fanatic and virgin Jinjo is constantly thinking about Yoohyun, who looks exactly like his favorite game character. Steward Yoohyun, who loves a man with a bara bod and big dick but has yet to meet one, is attracted to Jinho who is exactly that. Between Yoohyun, who provides in-flight service that is anything but ordinary, and Jinho, who's new to all this, will they be able to satisfy each other's needs when they arrive at their destination? "This time, I'm going to have lots of with a guy with a bara bod and big dick!"---- **Note:** Part of Bomtoon [](https://twitter.com/studio_Weiib/status/1471043087007105026) and the 9th Story (Ch.29-32) on [](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/vacationsex)+
